[ul][*]Bringing back the NR experience! [*]Professional and known staff [*]24/7 Active Pking & Skilling Community [*]Great Support Staff & Development Team [*]Active, Friendly Community Forum [*]Regularly Updated Wiki (50+ Guides, 6 different languages) [*]Great Pking Community & Clans From RuneScape [*]Fully Working Skilling & Combat System [*]Bonus Experience Rates & Starter Pack For New Players [*]Stable Economy & Active Market [*]Barrows (Easy Donator Access) [*]New ::Train Command for New Players [*]Custom Items (Lime/Lava Whips, Death Cape, Dragon Kite, Slayer Helm & PVP Armor) [*]Working Spirit Shields [*]Daily Server Events [*]PK Points With Rewards [*]God Wars [*]Fight Caves [*]Spirit Beast [*]Amazing and active forums! [*]Added Wiki! [*]Working Donator Pins! [*]Many donator benefits! [*]An amazing combat system [*]Nice features [*]Blank source, no leech! [*]All customs added: Lime, death cape, Red spirit sheild! [*]PvP weapons, Chaotics, Dragon claws, Hand cannon, Custom colored whips [*]Automated Donator System [*]Automated Vote system with rewards! [*]Custom items (Colored whips, colored rares) [*]Corporeal beast [*]Tormented demons [*]Custom Bosses [*]God Wars [*]Duel Arena [*]Fight Caves [*]Barrows [*]Warriors Guild [*]'key system minigame! Three types and amazing rewards! [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/e6vw50.png[/img][/ul]
